instructions: Install the Amazon Alexa app on your phone. Once you ve installed the app, log into your Amazon account. Go to your Android phone s Settings > Apps & notifications and tap Advanced . Tap Default apps > Assist & voice input > Assist app . Now that you have Alexa installed, you can select Amazon Alexa from the options for your voice assistant. To use Alexa on your phone, just press and hold your phone s home button and you re good to go.
